com.unibet.worktest.bank

Interface AccountService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountServiceImpl

    @Sealed
public interface AccountService
    Defines the business logic for managing monetary accounts.
    Author:
    Unibet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createAccount(java.lang.String accountRef, com.unibet.worktest.bank.Money amount)
      Create a new account with an initial balance.
      com.unibet.worktest.bank.Money getAccountBalance(java.lang.String accountRef)
      Get the current balance for a given account.

    • Method Detail

      • createAccount

        void createAccount(java.lang.String accountRef,
                   com.unibet.worktest.bank.Money amount)
        Create a new account with an initial balance.
        Parameters:
        accountRef - a client defined account reference
        amount - the initial account balance
        Throws:
        com.unibet.worktest.bank.BusinessException - if there are any problems creating the account

      • getAccountBalance

        com.unibet.worktest.bank.Money getAccountBalance(java.lang.String accountRef)
        Get the current balance for a given account.
        Parameters:
        accountRef - the client definied account reference
        Returns:
        the account balance
        Throws:
        com.unibet.worktest.bank.BusinessException - if there are any problems retrieving the balance or the account is not found
